bcbioRNASeq 0.2.0
  • Reference

Count Matrix Accessors

Source: R/methods-counts.R

By default, counts() returns the raw counts. Normalized counts, including transcripts per million (TPM) can be accessed using the "normalized" argument.

# S4 method for bcbioRNASeq
counts(object, normalized = FALSE)

Arguments

object

Object.
normalized

Logical or character indicating which normalization method to apply:

  • FALSE: Raw counts (tximport).

  • TRUE: DESeq2 normalized counts. Calculated on the fly.

  • "tpm": Transcripts per million (tximport).

  • "tmm": edgeR trimmed mean of M-values. Calculated on the fly.

  • "rlog": DESeq2 log2 regularized log transformation.

  • "vst": DESeq2 log2 variance stabilizing transformation.

Value

matrix.

See also

  • tpm().

  • tmm().

  • DESeq2::counts().

  • DESeq2::rlog().

  • DESeq2::varianceStabilizingTransformation().

Other Data Functions: metrics, selectSamples, tmm, tpm

Examples

# bcbioRNASeq ====
counts(bcb_small, normalized = FALSE) %>% summary()
#>   control_rep1     control_rep2      control_rep3       fa_day7_rep1     
#>  Min.   :     0   Min.   :      0   Min.   :     0.0   Min.   :    39.1  
#>  1st Qu.:   762   1st Qu.:   1795   1st Qu.:   660.3   1st Qu.:  1041.7  
#>  Median :  1855   Median :   3980   Median :  1604.2   Median :  2077.0  
#>  Mean   : 10849   Mean   :  22762   Mean   :  9665.9   Mean   :  8840.5  
#>  3rd Qu.:  4837   3rd Qu.:  11667   3rd Qu.:  4229.1   3rd Qu.:  5405.2  
#>  Max.   :914584   Max.   :1776858   Max.   :745122.5   Max.   :557896.5  
#>   fa_day7_rep2       fa_day7_rep3     
#>  Min.   :     0.0   Min.   :     1.6  
#>  1st Qu.:   900.4   1st Qu.:  1112.9  
#>  Median :  1910.8   Median :  2254.8  
#>  Mean   :  7774.1   Mean   :  9057.3  
#>  3rd Qu.:  4720.9   3rd Qu.:  5271.2  
#>  Max.   :726143.2   Max.   :865544.5  
counts(bcb_small, normalized = TRUE) %>% summary()
#> using just counts from tximport
#> estimating size factors
#> estimating dispersions
#> gene-wise dispersion estimates
#> mean-dispersion relationship
#> final dispersion estimates
#> fitting model and testing
#>   control_rep1        control_rep2       control_rep3       fa_day7_rep1     
#>  Min.   :      0.0   Min.   :     0.0   Min.   :     0.0   Min.   :    39.7  
#>  1st Qu.:    910.9   1st Qu.:   930.4   1st Qu.:   866.1   1st Qu.:  1060.4  
#>  Median :   2218.3   Median :  2062.7   Median :  2104.1   Median :  2114.2  
#>  Mean   :  12973.6   Mean   : 11798.3   Mean   : 12679.6   Mean   :  8998.8  
#>  3rd Qu.:   5784.0   3rd Qu.:  6047.3   3rd Qu.:  5547.5   3rd Qu.:  5501.8  
#>  Max.   :1093691.0   Max.   :920984.3   Max.   :977437.2   Max.   :567888.7  
#>   fa_day7_rep2     fa_day7_rep3   
#>  Min.   :     0   Min.   :     2  
#>  1st Qu.:  1042   1st Qu.:  1117  
#>  Median :  2210   Median :  2264  
#>  Mean   :  8994   Mean   :  9094  
#>  3rd Qu.:  5462   3rd Qu.:  5293  
#>  Max.   :840117   Max.   :869029  
counts(bcb_small, normalized = "tpm") %>% summary()

#>  1st Qu.:   143.7   1st Qu.:   154.3   1st Qu.:   141.8   1st Qu.:   188.70

# log2 scale
counts(bcb_small, normalized = "rlog") %>% summary()
